main event: A sighting of a white, high-speed object moving very rapidly through the sky in Akron, Ohio.
interesting points: The object appeared larger than a jet aircraft.,Its speed and maneuverability were described as beyond the capability of conventional aircraft at the time.,Five to six objects were observed, arranged in a row and moving from left to right.,The object's color was described as bluish-white.,The object stopped suddenly before vanishing from sight.
witness description: Male, age 26, watching TV at the time of the sighting.
